AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT
LBCASE LB Address: Claremont Hall Claremont RoadLB Grade: LOCALLB Ref: 107

description: Removal of 1no. ATM from front elevation and reinstatement of window
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.

The facing materials, depth of the reveals and pattern of obscured glazing used in the development to which this permission relates shall match those of the existing building(s) unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan 2016 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The applicant should arrange for a highway condition survey to be undertaken to assess the condition of the surrounding public highway prior to starting any work, and will be responsible for meeting in full any costs required to remediate damage caused during construction.All highways permits or licenses as may one required must be in place before works commence.Any new crossover (whether temporary or permanent) must be installed by RBK Highways only, unless a s278 Highways Agreement is in place.

Demolition of existing outbuilding was not mentioned in work description Please confirm description of works as the application form description does not correspond with the proposed works in the plans and/or supporting documents.  Confirmation can be in writing or by amending the plans to reflect the proposals.Note: Any documentation with the incorrect proposals will need to be resubmitted, this includes the description of works section on the application form.
